attributes.action: Stop messing about and make local transport work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If there is to be any improvement in road congestion, then there needs to be a coherant plan.The Office of the Prime Minister is in the perfect position to make changes, so.
Help to improve and create a workable, feasable local transport system which would allow people like myself to avail themselves for transport to places and venues I and others wish to travel to without a car. They must be frequent and on routes which serve the majority public.
